participant_1.name: Lila Johnson
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and nurturing, with a passion for animals and cooking.
participant_1.background: I spend time with my dogs, which helps me feel better. I'd brag about using my fame to advocate for animal welfare and conservation. My cats and I love the rainy weather in Portland! Last month the farm was foreclosed so I am looking for a new job. I wake up, eat breakfast, and practice my cooking before work.

participant_2.name: Mark Turner
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and enthusiastic about pop culture, enjoys whiskey and socializing.
participant_2.background: My work life is boring, but I love my whiskey and Comic Con. People do not like me too much but I like them anyways. I think I should bake my grandson some chocolate cake for his birthday. I am an only child and I am excited to start a new chapter in my life at college. I love to play with my cat Mater when I have free time.

content.text: Hey there, how are you doing?
Hi! Not too bad, just got back from class. You?
Pretty good, just woke up. I'm still on the farm, but the farm was just foreclosed so I'm looking for a new job.
Oh no! That's terrible. I'm sorry to hear that.
It's okay. It's not the end of the world, and now I get to move to Portland!
Oh, that's good! I love Portland. It's a beautiful city.
Yeah, I've been there a few times. I love the rain and the food.
Have you ever been to Comic Con?
No, I haven't. I've heard it's really fun though.
It is! I go every year. It's a great way to meet people who love the same things you do.
That sounds fun. I'll have to check it out sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
